About.title: About Me
About.description:
I'm a cybersecurity engineer
 with a Master's in cybersecurity and cloud,
 based in Paris. I excel in protecting data,
 mitigating risks,
 and ensuring robust security.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.description: If you need a skilled cybersecurity professional to enhance your team, please contact me. I am eager to contribute to your project's success.

ContactFormModal.description: Fill out the form below to get in touch with us.
